predicate.note: Frames file for 'guarantee' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison.

roleset.name: promise
roleset.note: This happens a lot; dunno why.

example.name: guaranteed SBAR
example.text: Maxicare also will guarantee that the banks will realize at least $7 million on certain notes pledged to them.
example.arg: the banks will realize at least $7 million on certain notes pledged to them

example.name: guaranteed NP
example.text: Apogee said the charge stems from a building supply contract in which the company guaranteed a contractor's performance.

example.name: passivized benefactive
example.text: According to the Illinois attorney general's suit, Watson & Hughey sent mailings indicating that recipients were guaranteed cash prizes.

example.name: guaranteed VP
example.text: However a Qintex Australia spokesman said his firm had never ``promised or guaranteed'' to make the payment.
